TopicTitle: Why is my IVA destroying kerbol?

Articles.Content: this is just weird, i have shown in the vid all the et up for my iva so let me know if anything jumps out as being wrong. this did not happen prior to adding iva and if i remove the iva it dosnt happen. this has happend when made by two separate modders and im running out of ideas!

try removing .mu at the end of your IVA cfg:

model= newpeli/spaces/pelican/peliIVA.mu

Danny2462 approve it!!!
it would be cool IF you could switch to another vessel, as it is its just a gam restart

- - - Updated - - -

try removing .mu at the end of your IVA cfg:

model= newpeli/spaces/pelican/peliIVA.mu

will do
